body.raw: When you change a source file, Contentlayer automatically updates the content cache, which prompts Next.js to reload the content on screen.
body.html: When you change a source file, Contentlayer automatically updates the content cache, which prompts Next.js to reload the content on screen.

body.raw: Blog posts have their own pages. The content source is a markdown file, parsed to HTML by Contentlayer.
body.html: Blog posts have their own pages. The content source is a markdown file, parsed to HTML by Contentlayer.
